en_US.project_summary: Nervos Layer 2 Godwoken is officially carbon neutral, as it has chosen to support Ripple Africa, a U.K.-based charity behind a fuel-efficient cookstove that is transforming kitchens in Malawi, via its carbon offset program.

zh_CN.project_summary: Nervos Layer 2 Godwoken正式实现了碳中和，因为它选择通过其碳抵消计划支持Ripple Africa，这是一家总部设在英国的慈善机构，其背后的高能效炉灶正在改变马拉维的厨房。
